properties.name: BgpAsn
properties.description: For devices that support BGP, the customer gateway's BGP ASN.

type.description: For devices that support BGP, the customer gateway's BGP ASN.

properties.name: DeviceName
properties.description: A name for the customer gateway device.

type.description: A name for the customer gateway device.

properties.name: IpAddress
properties.description: The internet-routable IP address for the customer gateway's outside interface. The address must be static.

type.description: The internet-routable IP address for the customer gateway's outside interface. The address must be static.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: One or more tags for the customer gateway.

type.description: One or more tags for the customer gateway.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of VPN connection that this customer gateway supports.

type.description: The type of VPN connection that this customer gateway supports.

properties.name: CustomerGatewayId
properties.description: CustomerGateway ID generated after customer gateway is created. Each customer gateway has a unique ID.

type.description: CustomerGateway ID generated after customer gateway is created. Each customer gateway has a unique ID.
